SELECT * FROM(SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) AS NUM1, EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, PROFILE_IMG, ENROLL_DATE FROM(SELECT * FROM MEMBER ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC)) WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT * FROM(SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) AS NUM1, EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, PROFILE_IMG, ENROLL_DATE FROM(SELECT * FROM MEMBER ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC)) WHERE NUM1 = #{no}

SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT FROM PROJECT WHERE P_OK = 'F' ORDER BY P_PROJECT_CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE P_OK = 'F'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) AS NUM1, EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT FROM(SELECT * FROM PROJECT ORDER BY P_PROJECT_CODE)) WHERE (P_PROJECT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR P_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND P_OK = 'F'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE P_OK = 'T' AND P_SEND_CONFIRM = 'F' AND P_END_DATE - SYSDATE <4

SELECT EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT FROM PROJECT WHERE P_OK = 'T' AND P_SEND_CONFIRM = 'F' AND P_END_DATE - SYSDATE <4 ORDER BY P_END_DATE

SELECT * FROM(SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) AS NUM1, EMAIL, P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER, P_TITLE, P_REP_IMG, P_SUMMARY, P_CATEGORY, P_PROFILE_IMG, P_NAME, P_INTRODUCE, P_PRICE, P_END_DATE, P_GIFT_ITEM, P_REFUND, P_DESCRIPTION_VIDEO, P_STORY, P_EMAIL, P_PHONE, P_BANK_TRADING, P_BANK_NAME, P_BANK_NUMBER, P_BANK_KINDS, P_OK, P_SEND_CONFIRM, P_CURRENTAMOUNT FROM(SELECT * FROM PROJECT ORDER BY P_END_DATE)) WHERE (P_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR P_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND P_OK = 'T' AND P_SEND_CONFIRM = 'F' AND P_END_DATE - SYSDATE <4

SELECT EMAIL,P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER,P_TITLE,P_CATEGORY,P_PRICE,P_END_DATE,P_CURRENTAMOUNT,BANNER_IMAGE,BANNER_LEVEL FROM PROJECT LEFT JOIN BANNER ON (BANNER_CODE = P_PROJECT_CODE)
ORDER BY BANNER_LEVEL,P_PROJECT_CODE DESC

SELECT * FROM(SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) AS NUM1, EMAIL,P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER,P_TITLE,P_CATEGORY,P_PRICE,P_END_DATE,P_CURRENTAMOUNT,BANNER_IMAGE,BANNER_LEVEL FROM(SELECT EMAIL,P_PROJECT_CODE,P_PROJECT_NUMBER,P_TITLE,P_CATEGORY,P_PRICE,P_END_DATE,P_CURRENTAMOUNT,BANNER_IMAGE,BANNER_LEVEL FROM PROJECT LEFT JOIN BANNER ON (BANNER_CODE = P_PROJECT_CODE) ORDER BY BANNER_LEVEL,P_PROJECT_CODE DESC)) WHERE (BANNER_LEVEL = 1 OR BANNER_LEVEL = 2 OR BANNER_LEVEL = 3 OR BANNER_LEVEL = 4 OR BANNER_LEVEL = 5) OR P_PROJECT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR P_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
